item.title: End MT-43 West at US-93 - Lost Trail Pass
item.description: End MT-43 West at US-93 at Lost Trail Pass. Turn right for US-93 north to Missoula; left for US-93 south to Salmon (Idaho). This junction is just north of the Idaho-Montana boundary.

item.title: MT-43 West Approaching US-93
item.description: MT-43 West approaching US-93. This small stretch of MT-43 between Chief Joseph Pass and Lost Trail Pass is actually in Idaho. There are no markers or other signs that indicate this stretch of highway is in Idaho.

item.title: MT-43 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on MT-43 west. Distance to Big Hole National Battlefield and Jct. US-93.

item.title: MT-43 West at MTS-278
item.description: MT-43 West at MTS-278 to Jackson. Continue west on MT-43 for Big Hole Battlefield and Jct. US-93.

item.title: MT-43 West Approaching MTS-278
item.description: MT-43 West Approaching MTS-278 in Wisdom.

item.title: MT-43 West - Entering Wisdom and Approaching MTS-278
item.description: Entering Wisdom and approaching MTS-278 on MT-43 west.

item.title: MT-43 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on MT-43 west. Distance to Wisdom and Jct. US-93.

item.title: MT-43 West - Deer Lodge County
item.description: MT-43 west in Deer Lodge County

item.title: MTS-569 South at MT-43
item.description: MTS-569 South at MT-43 in Deer Lodge County. Use MT-43 west for Wisdom; MT-43 east for Divide.

item.title: US-93 North at MT-43 - Lost Trail Pass
item.description: US-93 north at MT-43 East at the top of Lost Trail Pass, on the Idaho-Montana State Line. Turn right on MT-43 for Wisdom and the Big Hole National Battlefield. Continue north on US-93 for Hamilton and Missoula. The welcome to Montana sign is in the background.

item.title: US-93 North Approaching MT-43 Junction
item.description: US-93 North approaching MT-43 Junction. The MT-43/US-93 intersection is at the top of Lost Trail Pass on the stateline with Idaho and Montana.

item.title: MT-43 East at MTS-278
item.description: MT-43/MT-278 Junction to Jackson and Butte on MT-43 East
